name: replacetokens
description: Replace tokens in text based files
author: Guillaume ROUCHON

inputs.name: rootDirectory
inputs.label: Root
inputs.helpMarkDown: The root path to use when reading files with a relative path. Default: $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: targetFiles
inputs.label: Source files
inputs.helpMarkDown: A multiline list of files to replace tokens in.

inputs.name: tokenPattern
inputs.label: Token pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown: The token pattern to use, use custom to specify your own prefix and suffix. Default: default

inputs.name: tokenPrefix
inputs.label: Token prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: The token prefix when using 'custom' token pattern.

inputs.name: tokenSuffix
inputs.label: Token suffix
inputs.helpMarkDown: The token suffix when using 'custom' token pattern.

inputs.name: caseInsensitivePaths
inputs.label: Case insensitive paths
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable case-insensitive file path matching in glob patterns (sources and additionalVariables). Default: true

inputs.name: includeDotPaths
inputs.label: Include dot paths
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include directories and files starting with a dot ('.') in glob matching results (sources and additionalVariables). Default: true

inputs.name: encoding
inputs.label: Files encoding
inputs.helpMarkDown: The encoding to read and write all files. Default: auto

inputs.name: writeBOM
inputs.visibleRule: encoding != ascii && encoding != windows1252 && encoding != iso88591
inputs.label: Add BOM
inputs.helpMarkDown: Add BOM when writing files. Default: false

inputs.name: additionalVariables
inputs.label: Additional variables (YAML)
inputs.helpMarkDown: A YAML formatted string containing additional variables or file or environment variable references.

inputs.name: variableSeparator
inputs.label: Separator
inputs.helpMarkDown: The separtor to use when flattening keys in variables.

inputs.name: useAdditionalVariablesOnly
inputs.label: Use only additional variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use only variables declared in additional variables. Default: false

inputs.name: escapeType
inputs.label: Escape values
inputs.helpMarkDown: The character escape type to apply on each value. Default: auto

inputs.name: escapeChar
inputs.label: Escape character
inputs.helpMarkDown: The escape character to use when using 'custom' escape.

inputs.name: charsToEscape
inputs.label: Characters to escape
inputs.helpMarkDown: The characters to escape when using 'custom' escape.

inputs.name: verbosity
inputs.label: Log level
inputs.helpMarkDown: The log level. Default: info

inputs.name: missingVarAction
inputs.label: Behavior on missing variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: The behavior if variable is not found. Default: none

inputs.name: defaultValue
inputs.label: Default value
inputs.helpMarkDown: The default value to use when a key is not found. Default: empty string

inputs.name: actionOnMissing
inputs.label: Missing variable log level
inputs.helpMarkDown: The level to log key not found messages. Default: warn

inputs.name: actionOnNoFiles
inputs.label: Behavior on no file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The behavior if no files are found. Default: ignore

inputs.name: enableRecursion
inputs.label: Enable recursion in values
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable token replacements in values recusively. Default: false

inputs.name: enableTransforms
inputs.label: Enable transforms
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable transforms on values. Default: false

inputs.name: transformPrefix
inputs.label: Transforms prefix
inputs.helpMarkDown: The tranforms prefix when using transforms. Default: (

inputs.name: transformSuffix
inputs.label: Transforms suffix
inputs.helpMarkDown: The tranforms suffix when using transforms. Default: )

inputs.name: telemetryOptout
inputs.label: Opt out of anonymous telemetry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Opt out of the anonymous telemetry feature. Default: false

outputVariables.name: defaults
outputVariables.description: The number of tokens replaced with the default value if one was specified.

outputVariables.name: files
outputVariables.description: The number of source files parsed.

outputVariables.name: replaced
outputVariables.description: The number of values replaced by a value different than the default value.

outputVariables.name: tokens
outputVariables.description: The number of tokens found in all files.
